00026 //
00027 // adpcm.h - include file for adpcm coder.
00028 //
00029 // Version 1.0, 7-Jul-92.
00030 //
00031 //
00032 // Average compression speed experiment: P166MMX 32MEG
00033 //
00034 // INPUT         | OUTPUT    | COMPRESSION TIME
00035 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // shorts bytes  | bytes     | min msec.   avrg.    high peak (1 time)
00037 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // 512    1024   | 256       | ~4          4          34
00039 // 1024   2048   | 512       | ~7          8          75
00040 // 2048   4096   | 1024      | ~13         15         175 (!!!)
00041 // 4096   8192   | 2048      | ~26         33         91
00042 // 8192   16384  | 4096      | ~57         80         220 (~1 sec of audio)
00043 // 16384  32768  | 8192      | ~110        250        290
00044 //
00045 
00046 #include <QString> // fix for qtextstream.h
00047 
00048 #include "DccVoiceCodec.h"
00049 
00050 typedef struct adpcm_state
00051 {
00052         short valprev; /* Previous output value */
00053         char  index;   /* HelpIndex into stepsize table */
00054 } ADPCM_state;
00055 
00056 
00057 class DccVoiceAdpcmCodec : public DccVoiceCodec
00058 {
00059 public:
00060         DccVoiceAdpcmCodec();
00061         virtual ~DccVoiceAdpcmCodec();
00062 private:
00063         ADPCM_state * m_pEncodeState;
00064         ADPCM_state * m_pDecodeState;
00065 public:
00066         virtual void encode(KviDataBuffer * signal,KviDataBuffer * stream);
00067         virtual void decode(KviDataBuffer * stream,KviDataBuffer * signal);
00068         virtual int encodedFrameSize();
00069         virtual int decodedFrameSize();
00070 };
